CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: [9][10][11] One of the most powerful and flexible strategies to design low band gap conjugated polymers involves an alternating sequence of electron - donor ( D ) and electron - acceptor ( A ) moieties along the conjugated polymer main chain.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the "Material Name" entities are:

1. D - Electron-donor
2. A - Electron-acceptor
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure! Here are the relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name":

1. conjugated polymer

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are:

1. conjugated polymer

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| conjugated polymer |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
